info: This project was first started when I got into writing JavaScript. This has been my go-to place for exploring different JS skills. It mainly consists of different types of DOM manipulation techniques, a couple of simple games and some experimentation with fetch and Ajax by utilising different APIs. Very informal project that I use to play around with.
Database collection of books. Allowing the user to add their own favorite books. CRUD app, with RestAPI, MongoDB integration. Built with Express.
This was a project from Frontend Mentor, where I developed a tip calculator based on design images.
This website was first built in Express, and Vanilla JS. However, to get experience with React and build a more scalable and maintainable portfolio, I changed the codebase to use NextJS and React
Based on design files, I built a login/signup page, with React. Here, I also demonstrated how the React Router worked.
Snapchat makes it very difficult to download all your memories at the same time. So I made this app which gives you a much easier way than downloading them straight from the app.
